programme.title: Men's Triple Jump Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Triple Jump Final took place at the Stade de France, France, on 09/08/24. Jordan Alejandro Diaz Fortun (ESP) won the Gold with a distance of 17.86m. Pedro Pichardo (POR) won the Silver, and Andy Diaz Hernandez (ITA) claimed the Bronze.

programme.title: Women's Shot Put Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Shot Put Final took place at the Stade de France, Paris on 09/08/24. The Gold medal was for Yemisi Ogunleye (GER), Maddison-Lee Wesche (NZL) won the Silver medal and Song Jiayuan (CHN) won the Bronze medal.

programme.title: Women's 100m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 100m Final took place at Stade de France, on 03/08/24. Julien Alfred (LCA) won Gold with a time of 10.72sec, Sha'carri Richardson (USA) took Silver and Melissa Jefferson (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: The Vault: Helen Glover, Paris 2024 Costumes, Olympic Refugee Boxer
programme.desc: British rowing sensation Helen Glover comes to The Vault to donate her kit from Paris 2024 and recounts her incredible come back while being a mum of two. Jeannette unveils the incredible costumes from the Paris 2024 ceremonies. Rob stumbles on one of the most precious and largest items of the collection, a two-men rowing scull from Paris 1924 and discovers the surprising story of the unknown French boy who was the coxswain.

programme.title: Men's 50m Rifle 3 Positions Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 50m Rifle 3 Position Final took place at Chateauroux, France, on the 01/08/24. Yukun Liu (CHN) won Gold with a total of 463.6 points, Serhiy Kulish (UKR) won Silver, and Swapnil Kusale (IND) won Bronze.

programme.title: Women's Park Finals | Skateboarding | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Skateboarding Park Final with Arisa Trew (AUS), Cocona Hiraki (JPN), and Sky Brown (GBR) at La Concorde 4, France, on 06/08/24. Arisa Trew (AUS) won Gold with a total score of 218.2. Cocona Hiraki (JPN) won the Silver Medal and Sky Brown (GBR) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: Women's 50m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 50m Freestyle was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 04/08/2024. Sarah Sjoestroem (SWE) claimed Gold with a time of 23.71, Meg Harris (AUS) took Silver and Yufei Zhang (CHN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Fashion Olympics: Rebels
programme.desc: See how rebels on and off the field broke through limits by using fashion to share bold new ideas.

programme.title: Finals Piste: Women's Foil Team Bronze & Gold Medal Bouts | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Foil Team Bronze and Gold Medal Bouts took place on 01/08/2024 at the Grand Palais - Podium Piste. In the Gold Medal Bout, United States of America won the Gold over Italy, who won Silver. In the Bronze Medal Bout, Japan took the Bronze over Canada.

programme.title: Can Buff Dude @Brandon_Myles survive Enzo Lefort's Fencing workout?
programme.desc: French Olympian Enzo Lefort takes on bodybuilding influencer Brandon White to unravel what really goes into the making of a foil fencer.

programme.title: BRA-USA - Women's Gold Medal Match | Football | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Woman's Gold Medal Match took place at Parc des Princes, Paris, on 10/08/2024. The United States of America won the Gold with a victory over Brazil. Final score USA 1:0 BRA.

programme.title: Neymar Jr: A shot to heal a nation | Wait For It
programme.desc: A 24-year-old Neymar is about to shoot a penalty kick that may close decades-old wounds and change Olympic history forever.

programme.title: How the J-Village became a symbol of the recovery of Fukushima.
programme.desc: The national soccer training centre served as a base for cleanup efforts after the nuclear disaster; eight years later is fostering the next generation of Japanese footballers again.

programme.title: Men's Final | Modern Pentathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Modern Pentathlon Men's Final took place at Château de Versailles, Paris on 10/08/24. Ahmed Elgendy (EGY) won the Gold Medal, Taishu Sato (JPN) won the Silver medal and the Bronze medal was for Giorgio Malan (ITA).

programme.title: Road to Glory - Athletics - The Middle Distance
programme.desc: The stories behind the key moments in middle distance running at the Olympic Games, including stars like Paavo Nurmi and Maria Mutola.

programme.title: Individual All-Around Final | Rhythmic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session contains the Individual All-Around Final which took place at La Chapelle Arena, Paris at 09/08/2024.
Darja Varfolomeev (GER) won Gold, Boryana Kaleyn (BUL) won Silver and Sofia Raffaeli (ITA) won Bronze.

programme.title: Nastia Liukin at age 16
programme.desc: American gymnast Nastia Liukin has a fine sporting pedigree through her parents and as a teenager in Texas she wanted to follow their lead.

programme.title: Thema Williams: Gymnastics as an everyday outdoor activity | Her Game
programme.desc: Watch the inspiring Thema Williams explain how she takes gymnastics and ‘finesses’ it. She was the first gymnast in her country to compete at the World Championships in 2011. Featured song: Stop this Flame by Celeste

programme.title: Women's 25m Pistol Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Shooting 25m Pistol Finals were held on 03/08/2024 at Chateauroux Shooting Centre, Paris. Yang Jiin (KOR) claimed Gold, Camille Jedrzejewski (FRA) SIlver and Veronika Major (HUN) completed the podium

programme.title: Women's 5000m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 5000m Final took place at Stade de France, on 05/08/24. Beatrice Chebet (KEN) won Gold with a time of 14:28.56 minutes. Faith Kipyegon (KEN) won Silver and Sifan Hassan (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 3000m Steeplechase Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 3000m Steeplechase Final took place at Stade de France, on 06/08/24. Winfred Yavi (BRN) won Gold with an Olympic record time of 8:52.76 minutes. Peruth Chemutai (UGA) won Silver, and Faith Cherotich (KEN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 1500m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 1500m Final took place at Stade de France, on 06/08/24. Cole Hocker (USA) won Gold with an Olympic record time 3:27.65 minutes. Josh Kerr (GBR) won Silver, and Yared Nuguse (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 200m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 200m Final took place at Stade de France, on 06/08/24. Gabrielle Thomas (USA) won Gold with a time of 21.83 seconds. Julien Alfred (LCA) won Silver, and Brittany Brown (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 100m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 100m Final took place at Stade de France, on 04/08/24. Noah Lyles (USA) won Gold with a time of 9.79 seconds. Kishane Thompson (JAM) took Silver and Fred Kerley (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 400m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 400m Final took place at Stade de France, on 07/08/24. Quincy Hall (USA) won Gold with a time of 43.40 seconds. Matthew Hudson-Smith (GBR) won Silver and Muzala Samukonga (ZAM) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 3000m Steeplechase Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 3000m Steeplechase Final took place at Stade de France, on 07/08/24. Soufiane El Bakkali won Gold with a time of 8:06.05 minutes. Kenneth Rooks (USA) won Silver, and Abraham Kibiwot (KEN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Final Men's 200m | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 200m Final took place at Stade de France, on 08/08/24. Letsile Tebogo (BOT) won Gold with a time of 19.46sec. Kenneth Bednarek (USA) took Silver, and Noah Lyles (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Final Women's 400m Hurdles | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 400m Hurdles Final took place at Stade de France, on 08/08/24. Sydney McLaughlin-Levrone (USA) won Gold with a World Record time of 50.37 seconds. Anna Cockrell (USA) won Silver, and Femke Bol (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 110m Hurdles Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 110m Hurdles Final took place at Stade de France, on 08/08/24. Grant Holloway (USA) won Gold with a time of 12.99 seconds. Daniel Roberts (USA) won Silver, and Rasheed Broadbell (JAM) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 4x100m Relay Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 4x100m Relay final took place at Stade de France, on 09/08/24. The United States of America won Gold with a time of 41.78 seconds. Great Britain won Silver and Germany completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 400m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 400m Final took place at Stade de France, on 09/08/24. Marileidy Paulino (DOM) won Gold with an Olympic Record time of 48.17 seconds. Salwa Eid Naser (BRN) won Silver and Natalie Kaczmarek (POL) completed the podium.

programme.title: The Vault: Greg Louganis, Hollywood, Beach Volleyball, Mascots
programme.desc: As we uncover Los Angeles 1984 Olympics memorabilia, we get to travel to the home of diving legend Greg Louganis to discover his emotional Olympic journey. The Summer Games are back in L.A. in 2028 but Hollywood made the Games a star-studded show from as early as Los Angeles 1932, from celebrity appearances to Olympians becoming movie stars. In The Vault, Jeannette finds a very special beach volleyball from Paris 2024 and Rob surprises her as they discover The Vault’s incredible mascots collection.

programme.title: The Vault: Julien Alfred, the shoes of Cuba’s wrestling legend, Mexico 1968’s iconic design
programme.desc: Jeannette and Rob discovers Julien Alfred’s kit in The Vault, recently collected at Paris Olympics. The Saint Lucian sprint sensation has overcome many personal challenges to win the first ever gold medal for the Caribbean Island in the 100m final. Rob discovers the magic of a seemingly ordinary dollar bill, in the equestrian community while we learn about the iconic design of Mexico 1968.

programme.title: Women's Park Finals | Skateboarding | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Skateboarding Park Final with Arisa Trew (AUS), Cocona Hiraki (JPN), and Sky Brown (GBR) at La Concorde 4, France, on 06/08/24. Arisa Trew (AUS) won Gold with a total score of 218.2. Cocona Hiraki (JPN) won the Silver Medal and Sky Brown (GBR) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: Margie Didal: do what you love - Philippines / Skateboarding I By Her Rules
programme.desc: Margie first encountered skateboarding while helping her mother sell street food to make ends meet. Now she supports her family as one of the top skateboarders in Asia. Being a skater, she is a bit of a rebel in Filipina culture, but she is the sport sensation of the country and a strong chance of a medal at Tokyo 2020. She is paving the way for the next generation of women in skateboarding.

programme.title: Rachelle Vinberg: New York City skate of mind | Urbanity
programme.desc: Skate Kitchen star Rachelle Vinberg combines her love of skateboarding and the city streets to give us a personal tour of her life and the “Big Apple”

programme.title: Men's Lead Semi-Final, Women's Speed Final | Sport Climbing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session includes the Men's Boulder & Lead Semi-Final, the Women's Speed Quarter-Final, Women's Speed Semi-Final and the Women's Speed Final which took place at Le Bourget Sport Climbing Venue on 07/08/24.
The Women's Speed Final was won by Aleksandra Miroslaw (POL) with Gold, Deng Lijuan (CHN) with Silver and Aleksandra Kalucka (POL) with Bronze.

programme.title: Rachelle Vinberg: New York City skate of mind | Urbanity
programme.desc: Skate Kitchen star Rachelle Vinberg combines her love of skateboarding and the city streets to give us a personal tour of her life and the “Big Apple”

programme.title: In Concert | Sky Brown and Yungblud | From the Top
programme.desc: Yungblud leads Sky to a nearby venue where he and his band perform a private concert for her, the first rock concert Sky has ever attended in her life.

programme.title: Men's 1500m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 1500m Final took place at Stade de France, on 06/08/24. Cole Hocker (USA) won Gold with an Olympic record time 3:27.65 minutes. Josh Kerr (GBR) won Silver, and Yared Nuguse (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: The Vault: Helen Glover, Paris 2024 Costumes, Olympic Refugee Boxer
programme.desc: British rowing sensation Helen Glover comes to The Vault to donate her kit from Paris 2024 and recounts her incredible come back while being a mum of two. Jeannette unveils the incredible costumes from the Paris 2024 ceremonies. Rob stumbles on one of the most precious and largest items of the collection, a two-men rowing scull from Paris 1924 and discovers the surprising story of the unknown French boy who was the coxswain.

programme.title: Fashion Olympics: Rebels
programme.desc: See how rebels on and off the field broke through limits by using fashion to share bold new ideas.

programme.title: Pairs, Lightweight Double Sculls, Single Sculls | Rowing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session took place at Nautical St - Flat Water, France, on 02/08/24.
At the Men's Pairs Final, Croatia won the Gold, Great Britain took the Silver, and Switzerland claimed the Bronze medal.
At the Women's Pairs Final, it was Gold for Netherlands, Silver for Romania and Bronze for Australia.
At the Men's Lightweight Double Sculls Final, Gold was claimed by Team Ireland, Silver by Team Italy and Bronze by Team Greece.
Finally, at the Women's Lightweight Double Sculls Final, Team Great Britain won the Gold medal, the Silver was claimed by Team Ireland, and the Bronze by Team Greece.

programme.title: Olympic rowing champion Sizwe Ndlovu visits refugees in Greece
programme.desc: In Greece, Sizwe Ndlovu plays badminton, wheelchair basketball and judo with the refugees and was touched by the generosity of the Greeks.

programme.title: Finals Piste: Men's Epee Bronze & Gold Medal Bouts | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Epee Team Bronze and Gold Medal Bouts took place on 02/08/2024 at the Grand Palais - Podium Piste. In the Gold Medal Bout, the Hungria won the Gold over Japan, who won Silver. In the Bronze Medal Bout, Czechia took the Bronze over France.

programme.title: The ultimate fencing challenge feat. Gamers Razzbowski and Dawko
programme.desc: Razzbowski & Dawko learn all about fencing from Team GB Fencers Ben Peggs and Richard Kruse, who will win the ultimate showdown?

programme.title: Women's Final | Modern Pentathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Modern Pentathlon Women's Final took place at Château de Versailles, Paris on 11/08/24. Michelle Gulyas (HUN) won the Golden medal, Elodie Clouvel (FRA) won the Silver medal and the Bronze medal was for Seungmin Seong (KOR).

programme.title: Women's 10,000m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 10,000m Final took place at Stade de France, on 09/08/24. Beatrice Chebet (KEN) won Gold with a time of 30:43.25 minutes. Nadia Battocletti (ITA) won Silver and Sifan Hassan (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 800m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 800m Final took place at Stade de France, on 10/08/24. Emmanuel Wanyonyi (KEN) won Gold with a time of 1:41.19 minutes. Marco Arop (CAN) won Silver and Djamel Sedjati (ALG) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 100m Hurdles Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 100m Hurdles Final took place at Stade de France, on 10/08/24. Masai Russell (USA) won Gold with a time of 12.33 seconds. Cyrena Samba-Mayela (FRA) won Silver and Jasmine Camacho-Quinn completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 5000m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 5000m Final took place at Stade de France, on 10/08/24. Jakob Ingebrigtsen (NOR) won Gold with a time of 13:13.66 minutes. Ronald Kwemoi (KEN) won Silver, and Grant Fisher (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 1500m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 1500m Final took place at Stade de France, on 10/08/24. Faith Kipyegon (KEN) won Gold with an Olympic Record time of 3:51.29 minutes. Jessica Hull (AUS) won Silver and Georgia Bell (GBR) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 4x400m Relay Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 4x400m Final took place at Stade de France, on 10/08/24. The United States of America claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record time of 2:54.43mins., Botswana took Silver and Great Britain completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 4x400m Relay Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 4x400m Final took place at Stade de France, on 10/08/24. The United States of America won Gold with a time of 3:15.27, the Netherlands won Silver and Great Britain completed the podium.

programme.title: Strangest Moments | Episode 1
programme.desc: In this episode: a crazy marathon race, the Greg Louganis story, a false start disaster, why everyone loves Derek Redmond, and the forgotten Olympics.

programme.title: Men's Boulder & Lead Finals | Sport Climbing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Boulder & Lead Finals took place at Le Bourget Sport Climbing Venue on 09/08/24. The Gold medal was won by Toby Roberts (GBR), the Silver medal was won by Sorato Anraku (JPN) and the Bronze medal was won by Jakob Schubert (AUT).

programme.title: Gamers Vs: Episode 4
programme.desc: Popular Gamers apply their gaming skills to Olympic sports with the help of world-class athletes and international coaches but how does it apply to the sports of Climbing, Dressage and Karate.

programme.title: Women's 200m Backstroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 200m Backstroke was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 02/08/2024. Kaylee McKeown (AUS) claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record time of 2:03.73, Regan Smith (USA) took Silver and Kylie Masse (CAN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 200m Backstroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 200m Backstroke was held on 01/08/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Hubert Kos (HUN) claimed Gold with a time of 1:54.26, Apostolos Christou (GRE) took Silver and Roman Mityukov (SUI) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 200m Breaststroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 200m Breastroke was held on 01/08/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Kate Douglass (USA) claimed Gold with a time of 02:19.24, Tatjana Smith (RSA) took Silver and Tes Schouten (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 4x200m Freestyle Relay - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 4x200m Freestyle Relay was held on 01/08/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Australia claimed Gold with an Olympic record time of 07:38.08, United States of America took Silver and China completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 50m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 50m Freestyle was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 02/08/2024. Cameron McEvoy (AUS) claimed Gold with a time of 21.25 seconds, Benjamin Proud (GBR) took Silver and Florent Manaudou (FRA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 200m Backstroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 200m Backstroke was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 02/08/2024. Kaylee McKeown (AUS) claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record time of 2:03.73, Regan Smith (USA) took Silver and Kylie Masse (CAN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Group All-Around Final | Rhythmic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Group All-Around Final which took place at the Porte de La Chapelle Arena, France, on the 10/08/24. The People´s Republic of China claimed Gold, Israel took Silver and Italy completed the podium.
